metadata.synopsis: One of the hostages thanks you for saving them from the Iron Throne. One-liner dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Santoria - S_GLO_IronThrone_Group4_Prisoner1 a1831c84-e443-4ba9-95b2-49758d576bf5 - (-9; 37; 19)  in the Dock warehouse after saving them.Quick setup:- Load CTY_Main_A- Use Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 9)- Set Quest Flags and Options -> Act3 (LOW) -> Iron Throne -> Change State -> Back At Docks -> MajoritySaved- Then talk to the NPC

0.speaker: Santoria
0.text: You were so heroic, my word - I can't wait to tell Skorv what happened. Gods I hope he's all right...

1.speaker: Santoria
1.text: Thanks to you, me and my Skorv might see each other again...
